main event: A bright object with a tail of blue and red lights was observed over Union City, Indiana, on June 6, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 2030 hours., The object was bright and exhibited a tail of blue and red lights., John Doe was the sole confirmed witness to the event., The report was cataloged under Project Blue Book., A photograph of a cityscape is included in the documentation.
sighted object: a bright object with a tail of blue and red lights
